document.title: Reference for `eif_access'
document.paragraph:
2SYNOPSYS
#include "eif_hector. h"
EIF_REFERENCE eif_access (EIF_OBJECT obj );
2DESCRIPTION The eif_access() macro accesses the Eiffel object obj.
2RETURN VALUE It returns the Eiffel reference protected by obj and which can be passed to Eiffel routines.
2CONFORMANCE ISE Eiffel 4. 1 and later.
2SEE ALSO
eif_wean(1) , eif_adopt(1), eif_protect(1). Markup created by 1. 0, November 15, 1999.
